shinyVirga 0.39.3
  • Reference

    Add Transifex Language selector

    mod_transifex_select.Rd

    Must set up an environment variable entitled TRANSIFEX_API_KEY with your API Key created here and run transifex_select_server at least once in your app.

    Usage

    mod_transifex_select(
  inputId,
  label,
  choices = c(English = "en", Spanish = "es"),
  selected = c(English = "en"),
  multiple = FALSE,
  options = list(),
  choicesOpt = NULL,
  width = NULL,
  class = NULL,
  inline = FALSE,
  include_deps = FALSE,
  key = Sys.getenv("TRANSIFEX_API_KEY", ""),
  ...
)

    Arguments

    inputId

    The input slot that will be used to access the value.

    label

    Display label for the control, or NULL for no label.

    choices

    List of values to select from. If elements of the list are named then that name rather than the value is displayed to the user.

    selected

    The initially selected value (or multiple values if multiple = TRUE). If not specified then defaults to the first value for single-select lists and no values for multiple select lists.

    multiple

    Is selection of multiple items allowed?

    options

    List of options, see pickerOptions for all available options. To limit the number of selection possible, see example below.

    choicesOpt

    Options for choices in the dropdown menu.

    width

    The width of the input : 'auto', 'fit', '100px', '75%'.

    inline

    Display picker inline, to have label and menu on same line use width = "fit".

    ...

    Arguments passed on to mod_transifex_deps

    transifex_options

    list List of options to be passed to the liveSettings object. The option manual_init must be TRUE when including the dependencies anywhere other than in the head of the application.

    Value

    shiny.tag

    Details

    Implementation adapted from the Transifex docs

    See also

    Other translation: mod_transifex_select_server()
